prediction.health: Health will be excellent. You shall feel active and energetic. Do not indulge in overeating.
prediction.emotions: You will be happy and contended. You will enjoy whatever comes your way.
prediction.profession: Today is a very good day for businessmen and professionals. You shall gain profits and customers. Those in service can expect good news relating to a rise in salary or a promotion. However do not spend impulsively.
prediction.luck: You will feel very lucky today with most of your materialistic wishes coming true.
prediction.personal_life: You will spend on items which shall increase the comforts of your family members. Relations with your spouse/beloved will improve. You may surprise them with a gift. Social life will be good.
prediction.travel: Today is a good time to travel. You shall get happiness and relaxation from trips with family.

prediction.health: Apart from some minor health issues, you shall enjoy good general health today. You will overcome minor complications if any. This is a good time to embark on a new fitness regime. Keep away from bad habits and vices.
prediction.emotions: Today you shall feel extremely positive and in high spirits. You shall radiate positive energy.
prediction.profession: You will enjoy success in your profession. Profitable opportunities will surface in business. For those in a service, your bosses will reward you for the good work done; a good bonus may be on the way.
prediction.luck: Today is your lucky day. You shall get a sudden windfall gain or an old investment will bring huge profits.
prediction.personal_life: You may meet a new love interest. Pursue this person as this relationship can culminate in marriage. You may buy yourself a new conveyance or some other possession which has been on your wish list for quite some time now. You will win arguments.
prediction.travel: You are likely to take a tour for business related work which will prove successful.

prediction.health: Your health will suffer. Tendency to suffer from minor ailments like headaches, stomach pain, constipation are high. A small problem, if neglected, may grow into a serious one. It is advisable to consult a naturopath or alternative health practitioner.
prediction.emotions: You will find yourself feeling excessively emotional and responding to others in erratic ways.
prediction.profession: Be careful when dealing with funds, investments and finance. Unnecessary spending on wasteful items is indicated. You will have to bear more responsibilities at workplace.
prediction.luck: Time is not in your favor, so don't do anything depending on luck.
prediction.personal_life: Your partner will be under some stress, so be extra loving. Avoid third party interference in your personal or domestic matters. This is the time to clear all misunderstandings and resolve past differences with close friends.
prediction.travel: You will have to cancel your trip plans or holidays due to some unforeseen reasons.

prediction.health: Avoid rich foods or else there is a likelihood of a stomach problem. Anxiety can be the cause of some health related problems today. You tend to worry too much. Remain alert while driving and while taking up a journey.
prediction.emotions: You may face a day of inner conflict. The need to be accepted and wanted is very strong today.
prediction.profession: Keep your mind open, and look out for sudden developments. Be focused and be proactive in every opportunity that comes your way. Some unwanted expenses may create an imbalance on your financial resources.
prediction.luck: Today is not a day to depend upon your luck. You shall have to carve out your own fate by your efforts.
prediction.personal_life: You may have difference of opinion with your spouse. You may find your domestic front troublesome for your normal peace of mind. Be on your guard against deceit. A foe in the garb of friend may betray your trust.
prediction.travel: It is better avoid travelling, as it will not be rewarding today.

prediction.health: You are advised to be careful about your health. Your mind can be bit chaotic and this will affect your physical wellbeing. Meditation will help you in relaxing and maintaining a peaceful state of mind.
prediction.emotions: You may be a little disturbed from inside. But do not lose your patience as it is just a short phase and will pass by easily.
prediction.profession: This is not a good day for important financial matters. You will be troubled by some unnecessary expenses. If there is any business problem to be resolved, do so with an open mind and advice from experts.
prediction.luck: Your competitive temperament brings you luck today. You shall win any contest you participate in.
prediction.personal_life: Your family members would not be able to give you appropriate support. You will have to be more caring and sensitive on the romantic front. Household expenses can be out of control. Health of a child may be a cause of concern. This too will pass.
prediction.travel: Some impediments can postpone your trips. Even if you do travel, you will have to face discomfort and problems.

prediction.health: You’ll remain active. You immunity will be better. The sense of enjoyment will keep you in full control of your health. Be sure to get plenty of physical exercise today.
prediction.emotions: You can be especially motivated now to apply a creative vision to your work as well as personal life. You shall feel deeply that some change and improvement is needed in your life.
prediction.profession: Love relations will be favorable. Any kind of disagreements in relations shall be sorted out easily. You’ll receive help and support from your relatives. Some auspicious functions can also be organized in the family.
prediction.luck: Your day is backed by lady luck in all your endeavors. There are a few pleasant surprises in store for you today.
prediction.personal_life: Love relations will be favorable. Any kind of disagreements in relations shall be sorted out easily. You’ll receive help and support from your relatives. Some auspicious functions can also be organized in the family.

prediction.health: Today is best suited to bring about a complete change in your health and fitness regime. You shall be cured of some physical problem which may have been troubling you for quite some time now.
prediction.emotions: You will be at the top shape and will perform excellently in all pursuits. Colleagues at workplace are going to be especially helpful and accommodating. You may get some good news relating to promotion or increase in business.

prediction.health: Indigestion and pains may cause inconvenience. Eat reasonably as overeating is likely to cause a number of problems including stomach ailments today.  Changing diet may help you a lot. Try your hand at some sport or some other outdoor activity.
prediction.emotions: Listen to your inner voice today. This will help you in taking the right decisions.

prediction.luck: Your competitive disposition and perseverance will bring you luck. All you need to do is keep putting in your best.
prediction.personal_life: You will actively participate in some auspicious activities. Elder family members will visit you Family and friends get together will keep you busy. You may plan a surprise party to show your love and affection for your partner.
prediction.travel: Some of you may get an offer to travel abroad on work. You can start your planning now.

prediction.health: You'll be glad to feel fresh, fit and fine. No major trouble is visible on health front. You must include breathing exercise s in order to relieve stress. Intake of balanced diet is must. Avoid spicy and oily food.
prediction.emotions: Today you will find yourself overflowing with ideas. Career and professional achievement would be the fields into which your emotions are best channeled.
prediction.profession: Income will increase. Bosses will be pleased in the office. Business will grow. Do not deny taking a new responsibility today. Working conditions are in your favor. The day is good for traders. Funds can be invested in new projects.
prediction.luck: Luck is on your side. You will spend time with family and may also celebrate happy some happy occasion.
prediction.personal_life: Love relations will strengthen and marital life will be beautiful. You will get full support from the family members today.  Friends will also favor you. Your children will keep you happy.
prediction.travel: Travel is on the cards for some of you. Take requisite care of your documents and belongings.

prediction.health: Unnecessary haste or rash behavior can make you vulnerable to accidents or injuries. You will have to face inner conflict, dissatisfaction, or a confused mental state. Walking, work outs and meditation will certainly be of special help to you. Keep a watch on your diet.
prediction.emotions: Professionals will face unanticipated denial of project and hostility in work environment. The day is not good for those in service. You can become target of conspiracies and backbiting.

prediction.health: The day is not very good regards your health. Do not take any medication without proper prescription. Take care of your food habits to prevent the risk of food poisoning. Avoid fried and junk food as it can lead to gastric problems.
